text: is a waterfall in Zaō, Katta District, Miyagi Prefecture, Japan, in on the Sumikawa River. It is one of "Japan’s Top 100 Waterfalls", in a listing published by the Japanese Ministry of the Environment in 1990. ==External links== * Ministry of Environment Category:Waterfalls of Japan Category:Landforms of Miyagi Prefecture Category:Tourist attractions in Miyagi Prefecture Category:Zaō, Miyagi
title: Sankai Falls
